name: Phantomasa 2
overview: Phantomasa, the famous heroine of Andromeda, conceived by mistake in the Android Factory, returns on an exciting adventure. The path in search of The Truth of our fabulous adventurer leads him to run out of a euro, so better than to follow the Primal Instincts of the Looter Robot and use all those Skills to steal all the gold from the Grunge Wizards in the surroundings of the Castle of Ogonshiro ?.
